title: Introduction to Tech
description: A foundational program introducing young learners to the exciting world of technology. From basic computer navigation to internet safety, this program lays the groundwork for future tech enthusiasts.

title: Digital Creativity
description: Unleash your ward's artistic side in the digital realm! This program sparks creativity while developing essential digital skills, from basic graphic design to simple digital presentations and manipulations.

title: Web & Digital Communication
description: Delve into the exciting basics of web browsing, blogging, and online communication. An interactive program that teaches internet safety, it's advantages and general exploration using search queries.
